pros: Fantastic team that is full of super friendly people, including management.

review_title: No support, development, or respect for tutors
cons: No tutor development, no tutor support, no respect for tutors. No job security. No career path or development. Tutors are not even seen as being part of the business "family", yet it's the tutors that make the college all its money. Poor pay: I received only one pay rise in nine years, and I received it after arguing for it.
